name: criminal_offences_registered_by_police
title: Criminal offences registered by the police according to the Swiss Criminal Code by canton, level of completion and level of detection
title_en: Criminal offences registered by the police according to the Swiss Criminal Code by canton, level of completion and level of detection
description: This dataset presents annual data on the number of criminal offences registered by the police according to the Swiss Criminal Code by canton, level of completion and level of detection, since 2009.
description_en: This dataset presents annual data on the number of criminal offences registered by the police according to the Swiss Criminal Code by canton, level of completion and level of detection, since 2009.
